Synopsis:
Balthazar Blake (NICOLAS CAGE) is a sorcerer in the Manhattan of today trying to defend the city from his arch-enemy Maxim Horvath (Alfred Molina). Balthazar can not do it alone, so he recruits, in spite of himself to Dave Stutler (Jay Baruchel), a normal kid but hides a great potential to be his protege giving an immersion course in the ancient art of magic. Together they must defeat the forces of darkness. Dave will have to draw on all her courage to survive the training, save the city and get the girl as she becomes "The Sorcerer's Apprentice."

Production notes:
Walt Disney Studios, producer Jerry Bruckheimer and director Jon Turteltaub, the creators of "The Search" and "The Search 2. The Secret Diary "presents" The Sorcerer's Apprentice (The Sorcerer's Apprentice), a comedy adventure about a sorcerer and his hapless apprentice who are drawn to the epicenter of an ancient conflict between good and evil.
